Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Paar, Unnai Naan Paarvonukku Dhevanaakkinen; Un Sagodharanaagiya Aaron Un Theerkkadharisiyaayiruppaan.
2 naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidum Yaavaiyum Nee Sollavendum: Paarvon Isravel Puththiraraith Than Dhesaththilirundhu Anuppividumbadi Un Sagodharanaagiya Aaron Avanidaththil Pesavendum.
3 naan Paarvonin Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththi, Egipthudhesaththil En Adaiyaalangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum Migudhiyaai Nadappippen.

4 paarvon Ungalukkuch Sevikodukka Maattaan; Aagaiyaal Egipthukku Virodhamaaga Naan En Kaiyai Neetti, Magaa Thandanaiyinaal En Senaigalum En Janangalumaagiya Isravel Puththirarai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadap Pannuven.
5 naan Egipthin Mel En Kaiyai Neetti, Isravel Puththirarai Avargal Naduvilirundhu Purappadap Pannumpodhu, Naane Karththar Endru Egipthiyar Arivaargal Endraar.
6 moseyum Aaronum Karththar Thangalukkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye Seydhaargal.
7 avargal Paarvonode Pesumbodhu, Mosekku Enbadhu Vayadhum, Aaronukku Enbaththumoondru Vayadhumaayirundhadhu.
8 karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:
9 ungal Patchaththirku Oru Arpudham Kaattungal Endru Paarvon Ungalode Sonnaal, Appozhudhu Nee Aaronai Nokki: Un Kolai Eduththu Adhaip Paarvonukku Munbaagap Podu Enbaayaaga; Adhu Sarppamaagum Endraar.

10 moseyum Aaronum Paarvonidaththil Poi, Karththar Thangalukkuk Kattalaiyittabadi Seydhaargal. Aaron Paarvonukku Munbaagavum, Avan Oozhiyakkaararukku Munbaagavum Than Kolaip Pottaan, Adhu Sarppamaayitru.
11 appozhudhu Paarvon Saasthirigalaiyum Sooniyakkaararaiyum Azhaippiththaan. Egipthin Mandhiravaadhigalum Thangal Mandhiravithdhaiyinaal Appadich Seydhaargal.
12 avargal Ovvoruvanaagath Than Than Kolaip Pottapodhu, Avaikal Sarppangalaayina; Aaronudaiya Kolo Avargaludaiya Kolgalai Vizhungitru.
13 karththar Solliyirundhabadi Paarvonin Irudhayam Kadinappattadhu, Avargalukkuch Sevikodaamal Ponaan.
14 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Paarvonin Irudhayam Kadinamaayitru; Janangalai Vidamaatten Engiraan.
15 kaalame Nee Paarvonidaththukkup Po, Avan Nadhikkup Purappattu Varuvaan; Nee Avanukku Edhiraaga Nadhiyoraththile Nindru, Sarppamaaga Maarina Kolai Un Kaiyile Pidiththukkondu,

16 avanai Nokki: Vanaandharaththil Enakku Aaraadhanaiseyya En Janangalai Anuppivida Vendum Endru Sollumbadi Ebireyarudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ennai Ummidaththirku Anuppiyum, Idhuvaraikkum Neer Kelaamalponeer.
17 idho, En Kaiyilirukkira Kolinaal Nadhiyil Irukkira Thanneer Mel Adippen; Appozhudhu Adhu Iraththamaai Maari,

18 nadhiyil Irukkira Meengal Seththu, Nadhi Naarippom; Appozhudhu Nadhiyil Irukkira Thanneerai Egipthiyar Kudikkak Koodaamal Arosippaargal; Idhinaal Naane Karththar Enbadhai Arindhukolvaai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Sol Endraar.

19 melum, Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Aaronidaththil Un Kolai Eduththukkondu Egipthin Neernilaigalaagiya Avargal Vaaikkaalgalmelum Nadhigalmelum Kulangalmelum Thanneer Nirkira Ellaa Idangal Melum, Avaigal Iraththamaagumbadikku, Un Kaiyai Neettu; Appozhudhu Egipthu Dhesam Engum Marap Paaththirangalilum Karpaaththirangalilum Iraththam Undaayirukkum Endru Sol Endraar.

20 karththar Kattalaiyittabadti Moseyum Aaronum Seydhaargal; Paarvonudaiya Kangalukku Munbaagavum, Avan Oozhiyakkaararin Kangalukku Munbaagavum Kolai Ongi; Nadhiyilulla Thanneerai Adikka, Nadhiyilulla Thanneerellaam Iraththamaai Maarippoyitru.
21 nadhiyin Meengal Seththu, Nadhi Naarippoyitru; Nadhiyin Thanneeraik Kudikka Egipthiyarukkuk Koodaamal Poyitru, Egipthu Dhesamengum Iraththamaayirundhadhu.
22 egipthin Mandhiravaadhigalum Thangal Mandhira Vithdhaiyinaal Appadich Seydhaargal; Karththar Solliyirundhabadi Paarvonin Irudhayam Kadinappattadhu. Avargalukkuch Sevikodaamal Ponaan.
23 paarvon Idhaiyum Sindhiyaamal, Than Veettirkuth Thirumbipponaan.
24 nadhiyin Thanneer Kudikka Udhavaadhabadiyaal, Kudikkaththakka Thanneerukkaaga Egipthiyar Ellaarum Nadhiyoraththil Ootruth Thondinaargal.
25 karththar Nadhiyai Adiththu Ezhu Naal Aayitru.
